# ignition_gan_outgoing (Resource)

Manages an Outgoing Gateway Network Connection in Ignition.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "ignition_gan_outgoing" "example" {
  host    = "10.20.30.40"
  port    = 8060
  use_ssl = true
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `host` (String) The address of the remote server.
- `name` (String) The name of the connection.

### Optional

- `description` (String) The description of the connection.
- `enabled` (Boolean) Whether the connection is enabled.
- `http_connect_timeout_millis` (Number)
- `http_read_timeout_millis` (Number)
- `ping_max_missed` (Number)
- `ping_rate_millis` (Number)
- `ping_timeout_millis` (Number)
- `port` (Number) The port of the remote server.
- `receive_threads` (Number)
- `send_threads` (Number)
- `use_ssl` (Boolean) Whether to use SSL for the connection.
- `ws_timeout_millis` (Number)

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `signature` (String) The signature of the resource.
